note: Configuration for the two_loop_rg_fingerprints module. Model selection is done via the central PyR@TE registry (tfpt_suite/data/pyrate_pythonoutputs.json) to avoid duplicated paths.

gravity_alpha3_patch.note: Optional TFPT runner patch: add Δ(dα_i)/d ln μ = κ_i * c3 * α_i^3 (with c3=1/(8π)). When enabled, the module will also compute a gravity-on table and report the difference to the baseline.
